alert.note: Alert for Marion; McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 12:52AM CDT until June 10 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central McPherson County in central Kansas... West central Marion County in central Kansas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1252 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Lindsborg, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Hillsboro, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Lehigh and Mcpherson Airport. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 50 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
